item.title: Pretty-print dates
item.description: To write out an ISO 8601 timestamp in the current language, you can use the date_l10n shortcode: Writing {{% date_l10n "2020-10-20" %}} will result in October 20, 2020 You can optionally specify a different formatting layout:
